name: Picross_a
description:
So I bought an arduboy and decided to make a teeny picross game for it!

It features 25 5x5 puzzles some of which might even resemble something.

It was really fun to make and honestly all the functionality was done a week ago I've just been struggling to come up with puzzles for it!

The downloads are for compiling and running on an arduboy if you happen to have one. If not you can play the game here. (The emulator uses the arrow keys and a/s as the buttons)
